level.text: 110.1 The Secretary shall be responsible for keeping an accurate record of theroceedings of all meetings of the Board and such other actions of the Authoritys the Board shall direct. He or she shall give or cause to be given all noticesn accordance with these bylaws or as required by law or the Act and, ineneral, perform all duties customary to the Office of Secretary.

110.2 The Secretary shall have authority to affix the corporate seal of theuthority to any instrument requiring it and, when so affixed, it may bettested by his or her signature or by the signature of the Assistant Secretary.

110.3 The General Counsel of the Authority shall be the Assistant Secretary. Inhe absence or disability of the Secretary, the Assistant Secretary shallerform the duties and exercise the powers of the Secretary. At all other times,he Assistant Secretary shall perform such of the Secretary’s functions as theecretary shall prescribe in writing.
